nodes.name: short title of node
nodes.description: more detailed explanation of the issue
nodes.pcp_metrics: information from pcp to determine whether problem
nodes.article: list of extern URLs (for example kbase articles) for addressing the issue
nodes.parents: one or more nodes that would be checked before this node

nodes.name: CPU
nodes.description: The speed of the CPU is limiting performance

nodes.name: CPU - serial code
nodes.description: The processors in the machine are sitting idle while others are quite busy.

nodes.name: CPU - cache issue
nodes.description: The cache is having excessive misses.
nodes.pcp_metrics: papi pmda, looking at PAPI_L2_TCM or PAPI_L3_TCM

nodes.name: Memory - swapping
nodes.description: Not enough physical memory and data being moved between memory and swap space

nodes.name: Memory - huge page defragmentation
nodes.description: The system is spending large amounts of time grouping small pages of memory together into contigious physical regions of memory
